name: Secret Of Fire
description:
Bring back the fire to the village and collect the 4 keys to the castle of the sorcerer to stop him, after all, he did all that...

Have Fun!

HOW TO PLAY:

[W] [A] [S] [D] - Move

Space - Attack

Team Members:

Story and Game Design: Dhara Luna

Programming and Game Design - Orolock

Art, Programming and Game Design - Totinospizzaboy

Music and sound design - Wrenwick
